actions.committee: Committee on Appropriations pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that the Budget Committee be authorized to report its views to the Appropriations Committee, and that the latter alone be authorized to report the bill
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that the Budget Committee be authorized to report its views to the Appropriations Committee, and that the latter alone be authorized to report the bill.

actions.committee: Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that the Budget Committee be authorized to report its views to the Appropriations Committee, and that the latter alone be authorized to report the bill
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that the Budget Committee be authorized to report its views to the Appropriations Committee, and that the latter alone be authorized to report the bill.

official_title: A bill to approve the President's rescission proposals submitted to the Congress on April 9, 1992.

summary.text: Rescinds the budgetary resources specified in the rescission proposal (R92-115) (Procurement, Marine Corps) transmitted to the Congress by the President on April 9, 1992, pursuant to the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to approve the President's rescission proposals submitted to the Congress on April 9, 1992.
